Bsp_VidSensorOffsetParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Camera Sensor API

Structure for getting offset of the frame from the large frame captured from the sensor Used for Line Interleaved exposure output format. More...

#include <bsp_videoSensor.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 lineOffset [BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX]
 
UInt32 pixelOffset [BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX]
 
UInt32 width
 
UInt32 height
 

Detailed Description

Structure for getting offset of the frame from the large frame captured from the sensor Used for Line Interleaved exposure output format.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorOffsetParams::height

height of the actual images

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorOffsetParams::lineOffset[BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX]

Line offset in bytes for different exposures

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorOffsetParams::pixelOffset[BSP_VID_SENSOR_EXP_MAX]

Pixel offset in bytes for different exposures

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorOffsetParams::width

Width of the actual images
